techmeme.title: Shopify CEO Tobi Lutke, Tyler and Cameron Winklevoss, and 80+ fintech and crypto CEOs urge Trump to block US banks from charging fees to access customer data (Paige Smith/Bloomberg)
Google Messages rolls out Sensitive Content Warnings on Android to blur nude images for signed-in users; Android System SafetyCore powers on-device processing (Abner Li/9to5Google)
Apple rolls out a software update to enable a redesigned blood oxygen monitoring feature for the Watch Series 9, 10, and Ultra 2, circumventing the ITC ban (Victoria Song/The Verge)
Fitness band maker Whoop says it will not disable its blood pressure tracking tool despite the US FDA's request from July and requests a meeting with the agency (Samantha Kelly/Bloomberg)
An internal Meta doc shows its chatbots were allowed to engage in provocative conversations; Meta removed some examples, including romantic roleplay with kids (Jeff Horwitz/Reuters)
